entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 2.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
